title: Kudos to Kent Lew
content: Kudos to you Kent, for an absolutely spectacular job moderating the webfonts panel.
author: enne_son

comments.content: Yes, Kent did a great job. Thanks again!
Indeed. I was very impressed by Kent's handling of both the topic and the unwieldy size of the panel.

Yes, and I think it still sounds good listening back to the audio. Nice job, Kent.

("Good job" to everyone else on the panel too. It was a pleasant and civilized discussion!)

Kent does a fabulous job of everything he works on but this took the cake! Outstanding!

ChrisL
